extendedInfo.description: NB: Major update! Please read Recent changes section if you are upgrading. If you experience any radical problems, or it's very small, please uninstall and reinstall or go to settings-->apps-->mystic halo and clear application settings. Should overwrite fine on most phones, except possibly some 720p phones like Galaxy S3. I am very sorry for any inconvenience, it will be worth it in the long run as I can add many new features.WARNING: Keep old version with Galaxy Nexus, and Droid RAZR or any old phone (e.g. Galaxy S). Their GPU's are too slow for the shader. I will launch dual-versions from tomorrow.==========================================================A cool, honeycomb-inspired abstract live wallpaper. Blue, patterned rings slowly rotate independently and fade in and out. Touch Enabled, OpengGL. Works on Honeycomb! Watch the video for a demo! New in v8: Optimized for new Galaxy S4,  HTC One and Xperia Z !! (1080p phones)New in v8: Fast color changes!Coming soon in v9: Notifications!!!I created this wallpaper because I loved the basic art used and wished it would move. I'm also a bit tired of so many live wallpapers that look very cool, but are too "busy" or colorful to make good long-term useable wallpapers. Art is courtesy Ryan Bliss of Digital Blasphemy: http://www.digitalblasphemy.comFeatures (enabled in "Configure" or "Settings"):* touch-enabled! Swipe up or down to spin the rings faster. Tap quickly to slow down again* Lots of colours: blue, magenta, pink, red, green, "Tron", golden, ice, fire, "magblue", green and more! More will be added. Note that loading of new textures can take a few seconds. This is not a bug and will only happen once.* Custom color slider with hue/saturation!* multiple fade schemes: linear, heartbeat, pulse and none. Timings and brightness are settable* sync schemes: make the rings spin in sync, alternating pattern, or random pattern. Control speed in sync and alt modes.* special effects: "centre glows" or does not fade out* change minimum fade value for linear fade style* move the centre of the circles left/right or up and down* shrink or expand rings * change brightnessHas been tested on a variety of platforms. Works very well on WVGA phones (especially Galaxy S and Galaxy S 2). Scales correctly for Honeycomb (tested on Galaxy Tab 10.1).Performance heavily optimised using OpenGL and good memory handling. Won't slow your phone down at all. Uses almost no battery life (check battery usage stats... less than your SMS app if registering at all)Special thanks to "Deep" Live wallpaper dev and Robert Green for excellent OpenGL framework. I will open source this in time to contribute back. Special thanks also to Roland Harrison, Tim Chen and my other "beta testers" for letting me annoy them so much with testing. So many bugs caught!Please support me with a good rating! I will respond to all direct emails. If you have a problem, ranting in comments is not a helpful way to sort it out! **Known Issue: If you manually modify your DPI from what it should be then you will see white squares**Note: trouble downloading, check this link : https://www.google.com/support/androidmarket/developer/bin/answer.py?hl=en&answer=1067233Android market-related known issueNote: if you "upgraded" from free version, this is a whole new app. You need to reselect "Mystic Halo" not the free version from Live Wallpapers, i.e. your existing free version will not just suddenly be unlocked.Thanks!

reviews.title: Umm
reviews.comment: Maybe a problem on my end but when I try to d/l it say insufficient space. Jellybombed\"like a boss\" Note 2. !Ok figured it out had going to wrong SD my bad :S Awesome App!!!
reviews.author: Devaughn Waiters

reviews.title: Ok but needs something
reviews.comment: Its greatand love the way it looks but drains my battery too fast. I think you should have a save battery button to save your battery. I have Samsung galaxy avatior.
reviews.author: Stephen Gibson

reviews.title: Please fix.
reviews.comment: The ring still too small compare to old version even after clearing data.  And the ring still rotate too fast even I\'ve set speed to 0. Please fix to old version conditions.
reviews.author: Keng Wei Tey

reviews.title: Small :(
reviews.comment: Ive had the wallpaper since i got my phone and it was amazing... Now since the update its been too small :(( and unistall and reinstalling did nothing... Nor did clearing data :/
reviews.author: Jeff Frisbie

reviews.title: Disappointing update
reviews.comment: I love this wallpaper but might need the old one back.. phone is crawling now :-( ik u warned us but a little frustrating since I have plenty of open ram. Why so much more cpu intensive now? Was really hoping it would get less demanding with updates lol
reviews.author: Marcus Reed

reviews.title: Best Live wp ever!
reviews.comment: This is the longest running wallpaper I have ever used on any phone. That\'s saying something. I would love the option to change the black background color. Couldn\'t find the options.
reviews.author: Michael Mccord

reviews.title: Question
reviews.comment: Is there any setting I can change so the wallpaper doesn\'t move left and right as I scroll through the different home screens?
reviews.author: Corey Turner

reviews.title: Beautiful app, excellent support
reviews.comment: This wallpaper is perfect, looks beautiful in your background without being distracting, its exactly what a live wallpaper should be. I had some issues after the update with the wallpaper causing my phone to lag so I sent an email to the developer who got back to me with a solution in minutes. I give this 5 stars.
reviews.author: Matthew Neel

reviews.title: Stunningly beautiful and very very cool
reviews.comment: The customization and touch interaction (to speed up or slow down the rotation) are cool enough to make the paid version worth it, but I purchased it mainly to support the amazing developer (and his dog) :).
reviews.author: Rajneesh Hegde

reviews.title: Best Live Wallpaper
reviews.comment: Using free one until I decide to purchase. Nice work!
reviews.author: Tomy Mandala Putra

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: But maybe we could have presets for the multicolored rings
reviews.author: Tyler Hartleb

reviews.title: Perfectly sleek
reviews.comment: I have a tron orange set of rings in the bottom right of my S4 screen and it looks sleek and stylish.  Good job Zantetsuken
reviews.author: jason baxter

reviews.title: Really?
reviews.comment: Uninstalled, cleared data, still the small rings appears.
reviews.author: Omar Olvera

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Looks really cool without being a distraction.
reviews.author: Brian Stahl

reviews.comment: A live wallpaper that worth your every cents!
reviews.author: Joo Seng Lim
